phokimo.src.ode_builder¶

Tools to build a ode equatin function.

Functions

construct_ode(concentration, t, table, rates)

A tool to automatically construct ODEs.

hard_coded_ode(c, t, k)

An example for an ordinary differential equation.
phokimo.src.ode_builder.hard_coded_ode(c: np.ndarray, t: np.ndarray, k: np.ndarray) → tuple[np.ndarray, ...]¶

An example for an ordinary differential equation.

This a hardcoded example for a differential equation. Necessary inputs are the concenatraion the rates and time. For the equation a simple first order decay is given. This functions needs to be given to the odeint solver.

Parameters:

  • c (np.ndarray) – Starting concentration

  • t (np.ndarray) – Time

  • k (np.ndarray) – Rates

Returns:

ODE equations

Return type:

tuple[np.ndarray,…]

phokimo.src.ode_builder.construct_ode(concentration: np.ndarray, t: np.ndarray, table: dict, rates: np.ndarray) → tuple[float, ...]¶

A tool to automatically construct ODEs.

Parameters:

  • concentration (np.ndarray) – starting concentration

  • t (np.ndarray) – time

  • table (dict) – table with information of possible reaction

  • rates (np.ndarray) – reaction rates as N x N adjacency matrix. N: number of structures.

Returns:

concentration profile for ODEs.

Return type:

tuple
